justification: The job description requires strategic thinking for developing business plans, which was not evident in the detailed tasks described in the resume.
B2B sales experience is central to the job, and the resume suggests involvement in sales but lacks explicit indicators of B2B focus or achievement.
Communication is a key requirement, but the focus on internal communications with teams rather than client relationship building in the resume suggests limited external communication skills.
Strong IT and manufacturing knowledge is required, but the resume content did not clearly outline such experience, which reduced this score.
Bachelor's degree requirement was not confirmed due to lack of educational background details in the resume.

requirements.criteria: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
5+ years of experience in business development or sales
Strong understanding of IT and manufacturing industries
Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite

input.job_description:
### Join Apex Global Solutions as a Business Development Manager  

Apex Global Solutions is seeking a dedicated Business Development Manager to bolster our B2B sales efforts and enhance our market presence. This role requires a strategic thinker with the ability to forge and maintain robust client relationships, lead market analysis, and drive revenue growth through innovative sales strategies.

#### Key Responsibilities  
- Develop and implement strategic business development plans to meet organizational goals.
- Identify and qualify new business opportunities and partnerships.
- Lead market research to determine new market segments and customer needs.
- Foster long-term relationships with clients through successful engagement and collaboration.
- Track and report on key business metrics, providing insights and data-driven recommendations to executive leadership.
- Collaborate with internal teams to ensure alignment and excellence in service delivery.

#### Required Skills  
- Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Proven experience in B2B sales and marketing, particularly in IT and manufacturing sectors.
- Proficient in market research and data analysis.
- Strong leadership and project management capabilities.

#### Benefits  
- Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
- Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement.
- Health and wellness benefits package.
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment.

Join us to spearhead business growth initiatives that deliver significant value and drive our mission forward.
input.additional_info: Preferred candidates are from top-tier institutes such as COMSATS University Lahore and Superior University Lahore. Apex Global Solutions supports relocation for the right candidate and offers remote working options. Our hiring process includes a detailed assessment of sales strategies, technical skills through practical scenarios, and behavioral interviews to evaluate cultural fit.
minimum_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
5+ years of experience in business development or sales
Strong understanding of IT and manufacturing industries
Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
input.resume:
Below are the Expectations and Key Performance Indicators for Inside Sales and/or  as 
Assigned by your Reporting Manager  
 
Every individual in inside sales team is required to contribute at least 3 leads (scheduled meetings along with spec 
sheets /company details shared with relevant sales teams) per week. That would be 12 scheduled meetings per 
month out of which at least 4 should be qualified.  
By definition qualified would mean a lead (scheduled meeting)  should fulfil the ANUM criteria.  
A- Authority, the person should be relevant to the product/service we’re selling. He/she should either be the 
influencer or decision maker  
N- there should be need for what we’re trying to sell  
U- urgency, should be a defined timeline for the project  
M- a budget allocated or at least defined for the project.   
 
All individuals should be well - versed on  their respective campaigns ( We’ll schedule their training sessions with the 
relevant presales). They need to make sure to have the right level of knowledge of the product/service to try to 
convince a prospect for a meeting and/or to prequalify a meeting.   
Every lead source needs to be present in their scheduled meeting as a moderator and share the minutes of 
meetings after every meeting.   
 
Once a meeting is scheduled following measures need to be taken:  
 Timely handover the lead to the concerned sales/pre sa les team including the spec sheet /company details 
and not just the invite. There should be at least a 48 -hour difference before handing over to sales. So if 
you get connected with some body this week, you try to schedule a slot with them for the following o ne 
and buy some time to get the prequalification details - Exceptions would be entertained either way.   
 No lead would be forwarded to sales without any prequalification details from the prospect (following the 
process that I've shared and/or take internal c alls and then handover).  We'll still consider the exceptions 
in some cases which shouldn't be more then 15 -20 percent.   
 Every individual is supposed to maintain a repository of the sales pipeline in terms of important follow ups 
before or after the meeting  is scheduled, hot and qualified leads. Hound the individuals and get a 
response be it with prospects or sales teams. In case a potential prospect has gone dormant, strategize 
with me and we'll get it to the table.   
Below are the relevant sales teams for r espective campaigns.   
AI/ML – Dr. Ali and Rashid Z afar 
Flex - Kamran Khalid and Asad J aved   
Custom app D ev/PS  - Rashid Z afar 
AWS - Furrukh S ohail and Raj   
Please be certain that I am looped in, in all your communications with them, lead  assignments/ spec 
sheets /details.  
 
Timings are  from 4:30 pm to 1 am  following and overlapping EST and UK time respectively.  
The star performers in my team i.e. the ones achieving and/or overachieving their weekly and monthly targets in 
my team would enjoy a relaxed environment and  flexible timings.  
They would have liberty to take long breaks or even leave early, opportunity to work from home - having all this 
discussed and approved by me.   
On the contrary non performers would not be able to enjoy any perks.  
Above all, the culture a nd environment of the team and company is of utmost priority any individual found 
instilling  negativity to the environment  and/or demotivation effecting team productivity would then and there be 
laid off.

details.name: John Doe
details.executive_summary: John Doe is a seasoned software engineer with extensive experience in Python and Excel, demonstrating strong technical skills and a commitment to excellence.
